audio_channels.description: Number of channels in the sampled audio file.

audio_sample_rate.description: Sampling rate of the audio file.

audio_sample_bits.description: Bit depth of the sampled audio file.

audio_sample_bits_format.description: Format of the bit depth of the sampled audio file.

name.description: Name of the input device for the sampled audio file.

platform.description: Platform of the input device for the sampled audio file (e.g., `ASIO`, `MME`, `Windows DirectSound`, `Windows WASAPI`, `Core Audio` etc.).

items.description: List of ASIO input channel numbers. Specify the input channel numbers of your device. The format starts from 0 (e.g., to use inputs 1 and 2, specify `[0, 1]`)

midi_out_device.description: Name of the MIDI device used for sampling.

target_peak.description: Peak level (in dB) for the sampled audio file. Normalization is performed based on the peak level across the entire sampled file.

trim_min_silence_duration.description: Minimum duration (in ms) of silence to be trimmed.
